Finley River Cowboy Church

Yall don't forget about cowboy church every Sunday morning at 10:00 AM at the Finley River Cowboy Church on Hwy EE in Highlandville Missouri. Featuring the Pastor JR Rantz from the Pulpit! AND you even get to sing along with us, country/bluegrass style!

We hope to see you soon!!!
